definition: to indulge in a life of luxury (idiom); extreme extravagance
poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly
to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]

sentences.english: Lead to his death and death lapped in luxury lesson is also encountered with many times.
sentences.chinese: 窮奢極欲導致身死國滅的教訓亦是數見不鮮。
